author: bergmeister
body:
## PR Summary

This is the continuation of [PR 5499 ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/5499) that had to be abandoned due to a fatal merge conflict and I did not want to risk accidentally reverting recent fixes.

- Remove unnecessary/unused default for productGuid because it always gets a new Guid when being called from `Start-PSPackage`
- Add defaults for required files but also add extra path validation attribute
- Rename ProductGuid to ProductCode
